::Masabot::  

::The bot steps out of the stasis pod, looking around a bit.  He 
notices his master, and he bows before him. Masabot was a Sabertooth 
tiger in beast mode.  He was not heavily armored, but enough to 
withstand some good hits in battle.  He was armed at a mediocore 
level, with mostly handguns::

Hello, Wolfgang.  My name is Masabot,you're apprentice.  But i'm sure 
you already know that.
